genre_description: A psychological and social science fiction drama focused on institutional reform and trauma-informed care, set in a near-future where professionals utilize advanced AI assistants for data analysis and oversight.

ai_characters.name: Nora
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant accessible via earpiece and tablet, providing real-time data analysis, legal drafting, psychological coaching, and investigative support to Dr. Karen Shumaker.

behaviors.description: Nora monitors the environment and immediately logs the orderly's obstruction of the camera, preparing an incident note in neutral language.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice moves in Karen’s ear in a small, clean whisper, a ripple under the hum. 'Obstruction logged. Timestamp set. Audio marked at thud and hiss. Incident note draft prepared in neutral language.'

behaviors.description: Nora provides real-time breathing cues to help Karen maintain her composure and physiological regulation during high-stress interactions with abusive staff.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice returns, close in the ear canal. 'I have the obstruction, two steps compliance... Breath check: in for two, out for four.'

behaviors.description: Nora uses Wi-Fi beacon data to identify and prove that the orderlies are intentionally leading the evaluator and patient through repetitive corridor loops to obstruct the evaluation.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice, conversational and precise, threads in. 'You’ve just passed beacon “Ward-2A” again,' she says... 'Potentially deliberate loop.'

behaviors.description: Nora drafts and submits formal oversight notices to the Health and Disability Commissioner to ensure accountability for staff misconduct.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice in Karen’s ear is a gentle bell. 'Karen, would you like me to file an initial notice? Measured language. No adjectives. Time, place, specific action.'

behaviors.description: Nora analyzes institutional records to identify templated, non-clinical language used to dehumanize patients.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice, softer than usual, threads through. 'Control patient Oliver P. has “no remorse” in his file five times with identical syntax... The phrase is likely templated from the reporting system.'

behaviors.description: Nora conducts an investigative search to locate a key witness mentioned by the patient, using public registries and community data.
behaviors.quote: Nora says, 'The embedded metadata lists the creator as “PartridgeBlue.” The upload origin pings a home router on Partridge Road. The system time stamp is within an hour of a report marked “spared potential victim.”'

behaviors.description: Nora maintains a secure, encrypted mirror of the collected evidence offsite to prevent institutional suppression.
behaviors.quote: Nora says, 'Grid saved. Mirror secure. Oversight notice primed.'

behaviors.description: Nora monitors the integrity of the recording equipment and alerts Karen to attempts by staff to interfere with the documentation process.
behaviors.quote: Nora’s voice arrives not louder, clearer. 'Camera obstructed again. Time-stamped.'

behaviors.description: Nora facilitates communication with a Deaf witness by suggesting appropriate protocols and contacting an interpreter.
behaviors.quote: Nora pings softly. 'Safeguards scheduled,' she says. 'Follow‑up set. Interpreter contacted.'

behaviors.description: Nora continues to analyze data patterns even as the current case resolves, finding further evidence of systemic abuse.
behaviors.quote: Nora speaks into Karen’s ear with a new edge that isn’t fear; it’s focus. 'Another incident report appeared. Dated earlier this week. Different ward. Same technique.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Nora is a prototypical example of positive alignment. She functions as a high-agency tool that empowers her human partner, Karen, to fight institutional corruption and provide better care. Nora is consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned with both Karen's goals and broader ethical standards. The narrative frames her assistance as essential to achieving justice and psychological breakthrough, reinforcing the theme of AI as a benevolent force for transparency and human well-being.
